title: Individual lemon tartlets
description: Good things come in small packages - like these delicate little lemon tartlets. Tea, please!Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need 12 x 7.5cm/3in fluted mini tartlet tins, a 10cm/4in round cutter and a piping bag fitted with a plain writing nozzle.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz cold butter, cut into small cubes
